argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualvaddcom.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualvaddcom.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 3 |  | ldualvaddcom.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) |
| 4 |  | ldualvaddcom.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | ldualvaddcom.x | |- ( ph -> X e. F ) |
| 6 |  | ldualvaddcom.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. F ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8, 1, 4, 5, 6 | #P_lfladdcom | |- ( ph -> ( X oF ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) Y ) = ( Y oF ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) X ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 7, 8, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_ldualvadd | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( X oF ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) Y ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 7, 8, 2, 3, 4, 6, 5 | #P_ldualvadd | |- ( ph -> ( Y .+ X ) = ( Y oF ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) X ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
